name: Warfighter - Night Shift - Toro
additionalNotes: Founded in 2015 by a group of retired soldiers, Warfighter Tobacco is a company that caters to those on the pointy end of the spear. Their branding, packaging, and product line names are designed to appeal to people like them — “warfighters” looking for a good cigar. Based in San Antonio, Texas, the company partners with manufacturers in cigar producing countries and imports their finished products into the United States. The cigars come in a sleeve that’s designed to look like the box magazine on a Barrett M82, with the cigars as the cartridges. It’s a great touch for a brand devoted to military and veterans.
